name: Baruuk Prime
description: Doomed are the fools who attack the peace and exhaust the restraint of this reluctant warrior.

abilities.name: Elude
abilities.description: Dodge all incoming projectiles, but only while not attacking. Use again to deactivate this ability.

abilities.name: Lull
abilities.description: A calming wave slows enemies until they fall into a slumber. Enemies woken by damage will be confused and disoriented. Short-term amnesia means all waking enemies forget anything that happened before the lull.

abilities.name: Desolate Hands
abilities.description: Summon a bevy of orbiting daggers to seek out enemy guns, destroying them with a small explosion. Combine with Elude to double the range.

abilities.name: Serene Storm
abilities.description: With his Restraint eroded, Baruuk commands the Desert Wind to deliver powerful radial strikes with his fists and feet. Each moment commanding the storm restores his Restraint.

languages.description: Verdammt sind die Narren, die den Frieden angreifen und die Zurückhaltung dieses widerstrebenden Kriegers erschöpfen.
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: Condamnés sont les fous qui attaquent la paix et épuisent la retenue de ce guerrier réticent.
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: Siano condannati gli sciocchi che attaccano la pace ed esauriscono la restrizione di questo riluttante guerriero.
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: 평화를 위협하여 이 살육을 꺼리는 전사의 절제를 고갈시키는 아둔한 자들을 기다리는 운명은 오직 파멸 뿐입니다.
languages.name: 바루크 프라임

languages.description: Condenado está el tonto que ataca la paz y agota la paciencia de este reacio guerrero.
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: 那些破坏和平，以及耗尽这位不愿出手的战士克制力的愚蠢之人注定会灭亡。
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: Обречены глупцы, которые осуждают умеренность и испытывают на сдержанность этого непокорного воина.
languages.name: Баруук Прайм

languages.description: 平穏を好むこの戦士に歯向かうものを待つのは確かなる破滅である。
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: Skazani na zagładę są głupcy, którzy atakują spokój i wyczerpują powściągliwość tego niechętnego wojownika.
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: Condenados estão os tolos que atacam a paz e esgotam a paciência deste guerreiro relutante.
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: 破壞和平並耗盡這名泰然戰士的自制力的愚蠢者注定滅亡。
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: ถึงวาระของพวกโง่เขลาที่โจมตีความสงบสุขและทำให้นักรบที่ไม่เต็มใจออกรบผู้นี้ต้องหมดความยับยั้นชั่งใจลง
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: Barışa saldıran ve bu isteksiz savaşçının dizginlerini serbest bırakan aptallar, yenilmeye mahkumdur.
languages.name: Baruuk Prime

languages.description: Приречені дурні, що вирішили порушити мир та випробувати терпіння цього воїна, який так неохоче вступає до бою.
languages.name: Баруук-прайм
